official_name: West Bengal Chief Minister Relief Fund (Nabanna) Scholarship

overview.description: Nabanna Scholarship is a need-based financial assistance provided by the Government of West Bengal to meritorious but financially weak students studying in Higher Secondary, Undergraduate, and Postgraduate courses.
objective_points: Reduce dropout due to financial hardship

eligibility_criteria.domicile: Applicant must be a permanent resident of West Bengal.
academic_background: Must have passed Higher Secondary / Graduation from a recognized Board, Council or University of West Bengal
Must be currently studying in a recognized institution within West Bengal

higher_secondary_or_ug.note: Applicable for HS & UG level assistance

exclusions: Students receiving any other Government or Non-Government scholarship for the same course
Applicants applying more than once within 365 days

document_submission_timeline.upload_deadline: Within 90 days from the date of registration

mandatory_documents.name: Application Prayer Letter
mandatory_documents.description: A written prayer addressed to the Honâ€™ble Chief Minister of West Bengal, signed by the applicant, mentioning full address, mobile number and email ID.

mandatory_documents.name: Recommendation Letter
mandatory_documents.description: Recommendation from local MLA or MP.

mandatory_documents.name: Family Income Certificate
issued_by: Deputy Commissioner or above (Municipal Corporation Area)

mandatory_documents.name: Self-Declaration Certificate
mandatory_documents.description: Declaration stating current course, year/semester, and confirmation of not receiving any other scholarship. Must be countersigned by Head of Institution with seal.

mandatory_documents.name: Marksheet of Qualifying Examination
mandatory_documents.description: HS / Graduation marksheet depending on level applied.

mandatory_documents.name: Bank Passbook
mandatory_documents.description: First page of active savings account showing Account Number, IFSC & Account Holder Name.

mandatory_documents.name: Admission Receipt
mandatory_documents.description: Current academic year / semester admission or fee receipt.

additional_documents_for_professional_co: Allotment Letter for professional courses (Engineering, Medical, Law, Pharmacy, Nursing, etc.)

important_rules: No dual scholarship allowed for the same course
Incorrect or incomplete documents may lead to rejection
Submission beyond 90 days will invalidate the application

benefit_details.amount: Variable (Decided by CMRF based on merit & need)

status_tracking.note: Applicants should regularly check application status after submission

official_reference.source: West Bengal Chief Minister Relief Fund (Nabanna)
